text: An independent consultant produced a computer-generated randomization schedule, and an independent study nurse allocated the identically packaged dietary intervention powders to the corresponding study number of the child. This study nurse was involved in neither the assessment of the child nor the allocation of the study powder. Participants, care providers, physicians, dieticians, and nurses involved in assessing the outcome were blinded.
